name: Carlos Santos
summary: Cybersecurity Analyst with 4 years of experience protecting enterprise systems and data. Skilled in threat detection, incident response, and security operations. Passionate about staying ahead of emerging threats and implementing proactive security measures.

experience.title: Cybersecurity Analyst
responsibilities: Monitor security systems and respond to incidents using SIEM tools (Splunk, QRadar)
Conduct vulnerability assessments and penetration testing on internal systems
Investigate security incidents and create detailed incident reports
Implement security controls and policies to comply with PCI-DSS and SOC 2
Collaborate with IT teams to remediate security vulnerabilities
Conduct security awareness training for 200+ employees

experience.title: Junior Security Analyst
responsibilities: Monitored client networks for security threats on 24/7 SOC team
Analyzed security alerts and escalated confirmed incidents
Assisted with security audits and compliance assessments
Maintained security documentation and standard operating procedures
